message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $9,500. I know you'll find great value in it and it's a very fair offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,800 for the product.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more to me than your offer reflects.  I could come down to $9,200, which I think is a very reasonable compromise.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value I believe the product holds, I would like to counteroffer at $8,900.
